touch /root/yum-install.log echo "install osg cvmfs" >> /root/yum-install.log 2>&1 ### Create the cvmfs user #cvmfs:x:470:470:CernVM-FS service account:/var/cache/cvmfs2:/sbin/nologin
echo creating cvmfs user >> /root/yum-install.log 2>&1 echo "/usr/sbin/groupadd -g &OSG_cvmfsgid; cvmfs" >> /root/yum-install.log 2>&1 echo "/usr/sbin/useradd -u &OSG_cvmfsuid; -g &OSG_cvmfsgid; -c \"CernVM-FS service account\" -s /sbin/nologin -d /var/cache/cvmfs2 cvmfs" >> /root/yum-install.log 2>&1 /usr/sbin/groupadd -g &OSG_fusegid; fuse /usr/sbin/groupadd -g &OSG_cvmfsgid; cvmfs /usr/sbin/useradd -u &OSG_cvmfsuid; -g &OSG_cvmfsgid; -c "CernVM-FS service account" -s /sbin/nologin -d /var/cache/cvmfs2 cvmfs
echo "yum install oasis" >> /root/yum-install.log 2>&1 yum install oasis >> /root/yum-install.log 2>&1
user_allow_other
CVMFS_REPOSITORIES=&OSG_CVMFS_REPOSITORIES; CVMFS_CACHE_BASE=&OSG_CVMFS_CACHE_BASE; CVMFS_QUOTA_LIMIT=&OSG_CVMFS_QUOTA_LIMIT; CVMFS_HTTP_PROXY="&OSG_CVMFS_HTTP_PROXY;"
export CMS_LOCAL_SITE="&OSG_CMS_LOCAL_SITE;"
CVMFS_SERVER_URL="http://cvmfs.fnal.gov:8000/opt/@org@;http://cvmfs.racf.bnl.gov:8000/opt/@org@;http://cvmfs-stratum-one.cern.ch:8000/opt/@org@;http://cernvmfs.gridpp.rl.ac.uk:8000/opt/@org@"
